profile.name: Himanshu Doye
profile.title: Senior Software Engineer
profile.bio: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and team leadership. Passionate about building scalable applications and mentoring junior developers. Specialized in React, Node.js, and cloud-native technologies with a track record of delivering high-impact projects for enterprise clients.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Lead engineer for the cloud-native transformation initiative, architecting and implementing scalable microservices. Mentored junior developers and established best practices for the engineering team. Reduced deployment time by 70% through CI/CD automation and containerization.
highlights: Led team of 8 developers in successful cloud migration

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained multiple high-traffic web applications serving millions of users. Implemented real-time features using WebSocket and designed efficient data synchronization systems. Improved application performance by 40% through optimization and caching strategies.
highlights: Optimized database queries reducing load times by 60%

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Built data processing pipelines handling terabytes of data daily. Developed RESTful APIs and implemented authentication systems. Collaborated with data scientists to create visualization tools for complex datasets.

projects.title: Enterprise Resource Planning System
projects.description: Led the development of a cloud-native ERP system serving 500+ enterprise clients. Implemented real-time analytics, custom reporting, and integration with third-party services. Achieved 99.99% uptime and reduced operational costs by 35%.

projects.title: Real-time Collaboration Platform
projects.description: Architected and built a real-time collaboration platform supporting document editing, video conferencing, and team chat. Implemented WebRTC for peer-to-peer communication and optimized for low-latency operations.

projects.title: AI-Powered Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a machine learning-powered analytics dashboard for business intelligence. Integrated with multiple data sources and implemented predictive analytics features. Reduced data processing time by 60%.

projects.title: Microservices Migration Framework
projects.description: Created a framework for migrating monolithic applications to microservices architecture. Implemented service discovery, load balancing, and circuit breaking patterns. Successfully migrated 5 enterprise applications.
